- Wire growth prioritizer score writeback into kanban priority fields (high/medium/low mapping).
- Add dashboard drift metric + alert threshold for strategic share.
- Add tests covering rejection, reservation behavior, and score writeback correctness.
- Completion details must include GitHub commit/PR/test links only.

done.name: [QDRIFT-01] Enforce execution start handshake to stop "waiting for instruction" stalls
done.description:
Root cause: agents enter passive mode when task intent is clear but no explicit kickoff token exists.

Acceptance criteria:
- Add deterministic start-handshake state machine for new tasks (ack -> plan -> first action within SLA).
- Emit "stalled-waiting" diagnostic event when no first action in 90s.
- Auto-recover by nudging active worker with explicit next step payload.
- Add tests covering kickoff, stall detection, and recovery path.
- Add GitHub evidence links in task completion details (PR/commit/test run).
- On blocker detection, attempt self-resolution first, then auto-launch up to 2 parallel fallback tasks without waiting for user prompt.
